articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian Delegation
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with the joint delegation of political parties of the State Duma of Russia headed by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is heading the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Russian Delegation
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, had a talk with the visiting joint delegation of political parties of the State Duma of Russia headed by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is head of the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma, on Wednesday. 
					 Ri said that the WPK and people of the DPRK are dynamically conducting the struggle for winning the final victory in the building of a powerful socialist nation and the standoff with the U.S. by dint of self-reliance and self-development, true to the spirit of the Second Plenary Meeting of the 7th WPK Central Committee under the wise leadership of Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He conveyed the statement of the DPRK government on the successful test-fire of the intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-15 which was newly developed according to the political resolution and strategic decision of the WPK, and stressed that Russia should have a proper understanding of the DPRK's efforts for ensuring peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the world.
					
					 Kazbek Taysaev noted that during its visit the delegation witnessed and admired the great successes made by the Korean people in the strengthening of defense capabilities, the economic development, the improvement of people's standard of living and all other fields.
					
					 The members of the delegation hope that their visit would serve as encouragement and support to the peace-loving Korean people who are waging a heroic struggle against the moves by the hostile forces to stifle the DPRK's sovereignty and rights to existence and development, he said.
					
					 They expressed the stand of major Russian political parties that the issue of the Korean peninsula should be solved peacefully and they flatly blast the aggression policy against the DPRK by the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 The talk discussed the matters arising in further strengthening the friendly and cooperative ties between the WPK and the United Russia Party, the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia and "A Just Russia" in the interests of the two countries and two peoples.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Russian Parties and Personages
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Russian Parties and Personages
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received gifts from the General Council of the United Russian Party, the Supreme Council of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia and the Central Council of "A Just Russia".
					 He also received gifts from Byacheslav Volodin, speaker of the State Duma of Russia, and Gennadi Zhuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					
					 The gifts were conveyed to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by members of the visiting joint delegation of political parties of the State Duma of Russia on Wednesday.

articles.title: Medal of October Socialist Revolution Awarded to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Medal of October Socialist Revolution Awarded to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation presented the 100th Anniversary of the Great October Socialist Revolution Medal and Certificate to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The medal and certificate were conveyed to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Wednesday by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is heading the visiting joint delegation of political parties of the State Duma of Russia.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The joint delegation of political parties of the State Duma of Russia headed by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is heading the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Thursday.
					 The members of the delegation paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They made deep bows to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round rooms where orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, motor car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The joint delegation of political parties of the State Duma of Russia headed by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is heading the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President, the members of the delegation looked round the historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae with much care.
					
					 They had a photo taken there.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, Sci-Tech Complex, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, Ryuwon Footwear Factory, etc.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Celebrate Successful Test-Fire of Hwasong-15
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Celebrate Successful Test-Fire of Hwasong-15
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The news of the successful test-fire of the new-type ICBM Hwasong-15 has thrown all servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK into great joy and excitement as it demonstrated the inexhaustible might of Juche Korea.
					 Dancing parties were displayed by working people of various circles and youth and students in different parts of Pyongyang, including plazas of the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Monument to Party Founding and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, to celebrate the great and auspicious event to be specially recorded in the national history spanning five thousands years.
					
					 The participants danced to the tune of songs "Our Leader Loved by the People" and "The Country of the People," extending the highest glory and warmest congratulations to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who registered a great success in accomplishing the historic cause of completing the state nuclear force and brought about such spectacular victory as putting an end to the history of aggression and nuclear threat by the imperialists.

articles.title: Victory Is in Store for DPRK
articles.content:
Victory Is in Store for DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The successful test-fire of new-type ICBM Hwasong-15 is another demonstration of the invincible might of Juche Korea to reliably safeguard the dignity, sovereignty and supreme interests of the Korean nation.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Kim Kon Chol, department director of the Ministry of Railways, under a large electronic display in front of Pyongyang Railway Station.
					
					 Kim said:
					
					 The exciting peal of ICBM test-fire is a clear answer of the DPRK army and people to the U.S. that re-listed the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism", and is an echo of jubilation that guarantees the sounds of creation and construction and happy laughter reverberating across the country.
					
					 And it comes to be a stern warning to the arrogant U.S. with its averted face to the strategic position of Juche-oriented nuclear power.
					
					 The U.S. should keep in mind that the initiative in bringing about changes in the situation and the treasured sword for preserving peace and stability are seized by the DPRK, the possessor of the strategic weapons of justice.
					
					 Kim Song Won, dean of a faculty of Kim Chaek University of Technology, said:
					
					 The successful test-fire of new-type ICBM Hwasong -15 showed all over the world the might of the DPRK as a world-level military power.  
					
					 At a time when the U.S. was making a foolish daydream that its harsh sanction might wring our windpipe, we have possessed of another new-type powerful ICBM weaponry system that frightened our enemies.
					
					 This is a great event that showed to the world again the validity and vitality of the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 As long as we are led by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the DPRK army and people will, in the future, too, bolster the self-defensive war deterrent in every way under the uplifted banner of the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.

articles.title: Kimchi Contest Held
articles.content:
Kimchi Contest Held
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A Kimchi contest of service centers and housewives in Pyongyang was held at the food festival center in Ryomyong Street from Nov. 17 to 30.
					 The contest drew cooks selected from service centers and women's union organizations and housewives in Pyongyang, and was divided into the panel of the General Bureau of Public Catering Service, panel of ministries and national institutions, panel of Pyongyang city public catering and the panel of housewives.
					
					 The contest judged processes of pickling, making condiments and soaking and included the process of sampling un-sliced cabbage Kimchi which was completed after going through preset fermentation period.
					
					 The contesters presented wonderful Kimchi, traditional national dish and worldwide health food, thus demonstrating the development of Korean food culture.
					
					 A variety of Kimchi showcasing processing technologies and reflecting sincerity of cooks and housewives were highly appreciated by the participants for their peculiar aroma and refreshing taste.

articles.title: Centenarian Receives Birthday Spread
articles.content:
Centenarian Receives Birthday Spread
 Nyongbyon, November 30 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Paek To Sim, a woman centenarian who lives in Nyongbyon County Town of North Phyongan Province.
					 Born into a poor peasant family in Ryongchon County before the liberation of the country, she was maltreated and humiliated under the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated Korea that she could live a genuine life.
					
					 She had dedicated herself to the agricultural production with ardent desire to repay the benevolence of the Party and leader that put forward her as the mistress of the land and the country.
					
					 She kept herself with busy even after becoming a pensioner.
					
					 She tells her children to work hard for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Pumice Sand Widely Used in Remodeling of Samjiyon County
articles.content:
Pumice Sand Widely Used in Remodeling of Samjiyon County
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Pumice sand is widely used for remodeling Samjiyon County in Ryanggang Province, the DPRK.
					According to an official concerned, officials and shock brigaders of the 216 Division have effective use of pumice sand abundant in the county, thus hastening the remodeling.
					
					The division succeeded in making putty with pumice sand and wall-block with white pumice sand and invented a method of decorative plastering with red pumice sand, thus adding formative and artistic value to structures.
					
					It has also produced with pumice sand a large quantity of building materials like tiles and flooring blocks.
					
					Meanwhile, the division has pushed forward the construction of a pilot factory for producing pumice building materials at the final stage.

articles.title: Autumn Tree Planting Conducted in DPRK
articles.content:
Autumn Tree Planting Conducted in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Officials and working people in the DPRK conducted an autumn tree-planting movement.
					 They planted trees in more than 9 000 hectares during the movement.
					
					 Officials of the headquarters of the forest restoration campaign in Pyongyang and local areas, party and power organs and the land and environment protection field let all institutions, enterprises and cooperative organizations plant trees as required by technical norms.
					
					 After preparing enough saplings, those in Kangdong County of Pyongyang and Rangrim County of Jagang Province planted more than 4.1 million trees.
					
					 Anju City, Phyongwon and Sinyang counties and other cities and counties of South Phyongan Province guaranteed the rate of rooting of saplings.
					
					 In South Hwanghae Province trees were planted in areas of more than 1 200 hectares.
					
					 Those in North Phyongan Province planted more than 1.2 million trees in areas of hundreds of hectares.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hails Successful Test-fire of Hwasong-15
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hails Successful Test-fire of Hwasong-15
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday editorially hails the successful test-fire of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-15, newly developed under the political resolution and strategic decision of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The successful test-fire of Hwasong-15 is of weighty significance, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 It is a heroic event which demonstrated all over the world that DPRK has accomplished the historic cause of building the state nuclear force.
					
					 The Hwasong-15 weaponry system, capable of carrying super-heavy nuclear warhead and striking the whole mainland of the U.S., has greater advantages in its tactical and technological specifications and technical characteristics than Hwasong-14 whose test-fire was conducted in July last. This is the most powerful ICBM, which means that the DPRK has attained its goal of completing the rocket weaponry system development set by it.
					
					 The successful launch of Hwasong-15 is a great event that proved that no force on the earth can block our dynamic advance toward the final victory of socialism.
					
					 Now the U.S. imperialists desperately tighten heinous sanctions and blockade against the DPRK while trumpeting about a war to break our will at any cost.
					
					 The DPRK conducted the successful test-fire of new-type ICBM despite the vicious challenges of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces and manifold difficulties. Thus it dealt a heavier blow to the enemies' sanctions and pressure and fully displayed again the invincible spirit of socialist Korea advancing on the strength of self-reliance and self-development. 
					
					 The accomplishment of the historic cause of completing the state nuclear force is a gift of loyalty presented to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who devoted their whole lives to prosperity of the country and the nation. And this is an extra-large event and a great victory that could be brought only by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the peerlessly great man.
					
					 This great victory will shine long in the history of our Party and country and further propel the all-out general offensive for implementing the decision set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: "Balanced Diplomacy" Touted by S. Korean Authorities Denounced
articles.content:
"Balanced Diplomacy" Touted by S. Korean Authorities Denounced
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article rejects the "balanced diplomacy" touted by the south Korean authorities.
					 The chief executive of south Korea on several occasions pledged "balanced diplomacy" by which he would have good relations with China while attaching importance to diplomacy with the U.S. and committed to playing the "role of mediator" between the U.S. and China so that their relationship would develop into that of cooperation and co-prosperity. He even trumpets about "keeping balance" in relations with ASEAN countries, Russia and the European Union and claims that "the new southern policy is a signal of 'balanced diplomacy'".
					
					 The article derides this as a foolish act of idiots going busy, unaware of where they stand.
					
					 In fact, this is not "balanced diplomacy" and "role of equilibrium" but a revelation of the intention to straddle the relations between the U.S. and China, an act disclosing the poor plight of those depending on outsiders who try to keep their existence in between big powers without independence, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The "balanced diplomacy" called for by the south Korean authorities is a pipe dream and an intolerable act of treachery which does harm to the dignity and interests of the nation.
					
					 The only way out for the south Korean authorities to get rid of the present crisis is to take to independence.
					
					 If they truly wish for diplomacy, they have to opt for independent diplomacy conducive to realizing national cooperation after ridding itself of the control by outsiders.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Censures LKP Representative of S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Censures LKP Representative of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Hong Jun Phyo, representative of the "Liberal Korea Party" in south Korea, is viciously challenging the public demand for the abolition of evils while going frantic after his visit to the U.S. at the end of October.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says:
					
					 Such act of traitor Hong is an intolerable mockery of the candlelight demonstrators demanding the abolition of evils, and also a last-ditch effort of a poor pro-U.S. stooge keen on reviving the dying right-wing forces, with the backing of the U.S.
					
					 Hong has long been branded as a mentally deranged man and a human reject for his thoughtless wild rubbish and unreasonable frenzy, and has been censured and snubbed even by conservatives, being called as "Hong Quixote".
					
					 Hong's desperate bid to rally the conservative forces to put a brake in the drive for the abolition of evils under the backstage manipulation of the U.S. is an intolerable act of treachery to do away with all the achievements made by south Koreans through candlelight demonstrations, and to reverse the current of history.
					
					 The situation proves that the puppet conservative forces' moves to calm down the demand for the removal of evils and conservatism and get out of the abyss of ruin have reached a serious phase which can no longer be overlooked.
					
					 Unless the desperate offensive of Hong group is checked, it will not be possible to realize the abolition of evils wished by the south Koreans nor will it be possible to realize the demand of the candlelight demonstrators for a new politics and a new life.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Bid for Overseas Aggression
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Bid for Overseas Aggression 
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Days ago, the Japan Maritime "Self-Defense Force" conducted a joint naval drill with the three aircraft carrier strike groups of the U.S. In August last the Japan Air "Self-Defense Force" staged a joint drill with B-52 strategic bombers capable of carrying nuclear weapons in the sky above the East Sea of Korea and made it public.
					 What matters are the reckless remarks of Onodera, defense minister of Japan, on the above-said naval drill. When he met the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea and the commander of the U.S. forces in the Pacific he said that the joint naval drill was very effective to show someone the decision of Japan and the U.S.
					
					 Minju Joson Thursday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Japan's active joining in the U.S. moves to realize the strategy for domination over Asia is not to cope with "threat" from someone but to revive the imperial era and achieve the wild ambition for reinvasion of Korea under the pretence of it.
					
					 Japan's bid for overseas aggression war is little short of jumping into fire with faggot on its back. 
					
					 There is no guarantee that the U.S. would be held wholly responsible for Japan's security during the life-and-death war.
					
					 It is the palpable reason that if a war breaks out Japan will be the first target and the whole island will be submerged in a sea of fire.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should stop such foolish act of lifting axe to drop on its own feet, bearing in mind that a war leads to self-destruction.

articles.title: Minju Joson Exposes Danger of U.S. Arms Buildup
articles.content:
Minju Joson Exposes Danger of U.S. Arms Buildup
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- U.S. Congress recently passed "draft amendment to the national defense authorization act 2018" which contains the appropriation for national defence and security and defines the policy orientation for next year.
					 Here the Trump group modified the "law on budget control" of the Obama administration under which the budget for national defence was restricted to 600 billion USD every year until 2021, and decided to increase it to 700 billion USD next year.
					
					 They earmarked much more for preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Thursday says it is a direct product of the sinister intention of the U.S. to hold a military hegemony with an unchallenged advantage by force and thus realize the world domination ambition.
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in squandering huge funds as military spending and getting keen on modernizing military hardware is to realize its criminal ambition of bringing down the DPRK by force at any cost, the paper notes, and goes on:
					
					 This clearly proves that the Trump group finding its way out in war and military confrontation, driven by "power-almighty doctrine", is a chieftain seriously destroying peace of the Korean peninsula and the security of the region.
					
					 The U.S. increase in military expenditure is obviously a challenge to the human desire for peace and a direct cause of bringing instability to the world.
					
					 That's why the progressive peoples loving peace against war have to see through the aggression nature of the U.S. and courageously turn out in the struggle against the war monster U.S.
					
					 This is the only way of ending the ferocious U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices and guaranteeing the world peace and security.

articles.title: Minju Joson Brands Abe as Chieftain Threatening Destiny of Japan
articles.content:
Minju Joson Brands Abe as Chieftain Threatening Destiny of Japan
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- These days Abe solicited heads of state of several countries to join effort for putting pressure on the DPRK, and at an international conference he cried out for "exerting strong pressure on north Korea" while calling for "stopping someone from nuclear and missile development".
					 He even gave the south Korean puppet forces a shot in the arm, calling on them to ratchet up sanctions and pressure on "north Korea".
					
					 In the meantime, the group of Abe has been keen on despicable media campaign to steadily imbue the public with hostility to the DPRK and incite war frenzy in a bid to use the "public sentiment" for meeting their sordid purpose.
					
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Thursday says the aim sought by the Abe group in its racket for escalating confrontation with the DPRK is to maximize the hostility toward the DPRK, inveigle the whole Japanese archipelago into militarist whirlwind, realize the constitutional revision for turning the country into a military giant and to clear the country of the aftereffect of the postwar system.
					
					 The Abe group rushing headlong into the cliff of destruction on a militarist chariot is a chieftain endangering the future of the island country and the destiny of its people, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should clearly understand that their groundless act of faulting the DPRK and going reckless would bring them a catastrophic end.
					
					 The people of the DPRK will never remain an on-looker to the sly acts of the Japanese reactionaries but will certainly force them to pay thousand folds.

articles.title: S. Korean Labor Movement Organizations Stage Massive Protest
articles.content:
S. Korean Labor Movement Organizations Stage Massive Protest
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the construction trade union under it reportedly staged a large-scale protest in Seoul on Nov. 28.
					 The Confederation held an emergency rally against the retrogressive revision of the "Labor Standards Act".
					
					 The speakers said they can never tolerate the Act as it goes quite contrary to the chief executive's commitment to cutting down working hours, and causes overwork and labor disaster.
					
					 Special articles lead to over-fatigue and death of workers, they said, demanding society respect workers.
					
					 The rally of the Confederation was followed by massive protest by the construction trade union.
					
					 More than 20,000 unionists held a demonstration from Ad Tower in Youido to the "National Assembly" building where the sit-in of workers was under way.
					
					 At a rally for pledging general strike, the speakers expressed indignation at the "NA" for evading the passage of the "draft revision of the law on construction workers".
					
					 At a joint press conference of the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Trade Unions and members of Jongui Party, speakers said that the cut-down in working hours is the wish of the workers and other people, demanding the authorities respond to it.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Demands Halt to Deployment of U.S. Strategic Assets
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Demands Halt to Deployment of U.S. Strategic Assets
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held the 186th peace and disarmament rally outside the puppet Defense Ministry building on Nov. 28, according to reports. 
					 It urged the south Korean authorities to stop deployment of U.S. strategic assets and war exercises against the north.
					
					 Speakers at the rally denounced that the joint air force drill with the U.S. to be held this time is aiming at preemptive attack on the north and escalating the danger of war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is unreasonable that the authorities are escalating joint military drills with the U.S. while calling upon the north to come to the table of dialogue, they said.
					
					 They said the present chief executive is enforcing the project for illegal deployment of THAAD after breaking the democratic order much touted by himself.

articles.title: S. Korean Men of Culture and Arts Sue Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
S. Korean Men of Culture and Arts Sue Lee Myung Bak
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Those persons of culture and arts in south Korea who had been suppressed by the puppet National Intelligence Service during the period of the Lee Myung Bak regime sued traitor Lee and his group, according to Newsis of south Korea.
					 A press conference took place outside the Seoul Central District Court on Nov. 28.
					
					 Speakers there sued Lee Myung Bak, former Director of NIS Won Se Hun and other culprits who cooked up the blacklist of the people in culture and arts.
					
					 Lee has not reflected the wrongdoings during his office, they said, urging him to make an apology for his crimes.

articles.title: Candlelight Demonstrators Not Guilty: S. Korean Newspaper
articles.content:
Candlelight Demonstrators Not Guilty: S. Korean Newspaper
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Voice of Seoul, an internet newspaper of south Korea, in an article on Nov. 28 demanded the innocence of the candlelight demonstrations who were suppressed by the conservative regime.
					 The article recalled that Lee Myung Bak brutally suppressed by abusing the power the evacuees in Ryongsan who called for the right to existence, and cruely violated the rights of the Ssangryong motors trade unionists.
					
					 Not content with this, Lee made it a routine to conduct surveillance of all civilians while getting keen on building his power foundation centering on Yongpho Society, it noted.
					
					 The article declared the beginning of the campaign to wrest the government acknowledgement of the innocence of candlelight demonstrators who had been walked away or thrown into prison under Lee Myung Bak-Park Geun Hye rule and had been deprived of their rights to existence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Britain
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A British committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in London on Nov. 20.
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Guinea
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A Guinean committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed with due ceremony in Conakry on Nov. 20.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The chairman said that they recall with deep emotion the noble revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il, a prominent thinker-theoretician and great master in leadership, ahead of the 6th anniversary of his demise.
					
					 The great HE Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung into the guiding idea in the era of independence and cemented as firm as rock the single-mined unity of the leader, the party and the masses and turned the Workers' Party of Korea into an invincible revolutionary party and the Korean People's Army into the matchless powerful army, he said, adding:
					
					 We will widely introduce the undying feats of the great leader HE Kim Jong Il among the people of Guinea on the sixth anniversary of his demise.
					
					 The program of events to be held ahead of Dec. 17 was discussed at the inaugural ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A Venezuelan national committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 17.
					 Felix Jesus Velasquez Castillo, general coordinator of the Federal Secretariat of the United Left Party, and Omar Lopez, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairmen of the remembrance committee which involves the representatives of various political parties, bodies and institutions including the Motherland Party for All and the Venezuela-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and immortal feats of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Meeting of Solidarity with Korean People Held in Sweden
articles.content:
Meeting of Solidarity with Korean People Held in Sweden
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Stockholm under the sponsorship of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association on Nov. 13 to express support and solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people and denounce the U.S. war moves to bring a nuclear disaster to the Korean peninsula.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Association, said at the meeting, noting that during his visit to the DPRK he witnessed the achievements made in improving the people's livelihood and building an economic power:
					
					 With reliance on their own strength, the Korean people are pushing ahead with the building of a powerful socialist nation despite the harsh economic sanctions and blockade by the hostile forces.
					
					 Owing to the Trump administration's undisguised aggression moves against the DPRK, the situation on the Korean peninsula is inching close to the brink of a war.
					
					 The DPRK is beefing up its self-reliant defense capabilities with the nuclear force as a pivot to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 The progressive people struggling for independence, peace and social justice must learn a lot from socialist Korea.
					
					 A solidarity statement was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 The statement flayed Trump's Asia visit aimed to block the economic growth and "topple" the social system in the DPRK.
					
					 The No. 1 rogue state in the world is the U.S. which has violated the peoples' basic rights to live, being engrossed in acts of aggression against other countries. It is the foremost task for the progressive mankind aspiring after independence and peace to fight against the U.S. imperialists, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The friends of the DPRK in Sweden extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in the struggle to smash the war moves of the imperialists and build a powerful socialist country and achieve the independent reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion rusa
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion rusa
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, converso el dia 30 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion conjunta de partidos politicos de la Duma Estatal de Rusia, encabezada por Kazbek Taysaev, secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa y jefe del grupo parlamentario de amistad Rusia-Corea de la Duma Estatal.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con delegacion conjunta de partidos politicos de Duma Estatal de Rusia
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con delegacion conjunta de partidos politicos de Duma Estatal de Rusia
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, departio el dia 29 con la delegacion conjunta de partidos politicos de Duma Estatal de Rusia, dirigida por Kazbek Taysaev, secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa y jefe del grupo parlamentario de amistad Rusia-Corea de la Duma Estatal. 
					Ri Su Yong informo el hecho de que bajo la  sabia direccion del Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, el partido y pueblo coreanos libran una lucha energica para lograr la victoria final en la construccion de la potencia socialista y el enfrentamiento antiyanqui desplegando el poderio de autofortalecimiento en acato al espiritu del segundo pleno del VII periodo del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					Y transmitio la declaracion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del nuevo cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-15", realizado segun la decision politica y estrategica del PTC, y enfatizo la necesidad de que Rusia tenga correcta comprension de los esfuerzos de la RPDC por preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo.
					
					Kazbek Taysaev dijo que durante su permanencia en la RPDC se hizo testigo de los considerables exitos logrados por el pueblo coreano en el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional, el desarrollo de economia, la mejora de vida del pueblo y otras demas esferas.
					
					Los miembros de la delegacion subrayaron que la presente visita sirviera del estimulo y apoyo al pueblo coreano pacifista que lucha contra las tentativas de las fuerzas enemigas para aplastar la soberania del pais y sus derechos a subsistencia y al desarrollo.
					
					Expresaron la posicion de los partidos importantes rusos de resolver de manera pacifica el problema de la Peninsula Coreana y rechazar categoricamente la politica agresiva anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites.
					
					Finalmente se discutieron los problemas de fortalecer y desarrollar aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre el PTC y el Partido Rusia Unida, el Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa, el Partido Democratico Liberal de Rusia y el Partido por la Justicia de Rusia, de acuerdo con los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises.

articles.title: Tienen lugar bailes para felicitar el exitoso lanzamiento de "Hwasong-15"
articles.content:
Tienen lugar bailes para felicitar el exitoso lanzamiento de "Hwasong-15"
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Todos los militares y habitantes coreanos se congratulan ahora por el pleno exito del lanzamiento de prueba del nuevo ICBM "Hwasong-15" que manifesto el inagotable poderio de la Corea del Juche.
					Para celebrar ese acontecimiento a ser registrado en letras mayusculas en la historia nacional de 5 milenios, los trabajadores de diferentes estratos, los jovenes y estudiantes se desbordan en estos dias a los lugares capitalinos habilitados para el baile tales como las explanadas frente al Monumento a la Idea Juche, el Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido y el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang.
					
					Los participantes bailaron al son de las canciones como "Nuestro Dirigente adorado por el pueblo" y "Pais del pueblo" rindiendo la maxima gloria y las mas cordiales felicitaciones al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un quien realizo la enorme hazana de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado y puso punto final a la historia de agresion y amenaza nuclear de los imperialistas.

articles.title: Efectuado en Pyongyang el concurso de Kimchi
articles.content:
Efectuado en Pyongyang el concurso de Kimchi
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 17 al 30 en la sede del Festival Culinario de la capitalina Avenida Ryomyong el concurso de Kimchi con la participacion de los cocineros de las entidades de servicios gastronomicos y las amas de casa seleccionadas por las filiales de la Union Socialista de Mujeres de Corea (USMC) en la capital.
					El concurso se realizo dividido en la categoria de la Direccion General de Servicios al Pueblo, la de ministerios y organos centrales, la de entidades de servicios gastronomicos de la ciudad de Pyongyang y la de amas de casa.
					
					Los participantes demostraron el alto nivel de la cultura culinaria de Corea al preparar excelentemente varios tipos de ese plato tradicional que se conoce ampliamente en el mundo como el salubre.
